content:
The total fighting loss of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 31.03.24 approximately:

personnel - about 442170 (+650) persons,

tanks - 6966 (+15) OD,

combat armored vehicles - 13304 (+20) units,

artillery systems - 11050 (+44) units,

RSHF - 1023 (+0) from,

air defense - 743 (+7) units,

aircraft - 347 (+0) units,

helicopters - 325 (+0) units,

UAV Operative-tactical level-8731 (+30),

winged rockets - 2048 (+2),

ships /boats - 26 (+0) units,

submarines - 1 (+0) units,

automobile equipment and tanks - 14717 (+47) OD,

Special Technique - 1823 (+9)

The data is specified.

As reported by the Armyinform, for the last daywas destroyed730 invaders.
title: The enemy's loss exceeded 442 thousand invaders - the General Staff of the Armed Forces
description: personnel - about 442170 (+650) persons, tanks - 6966 (+15) OD, combat ...
author: Army Inform
